short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feel the heartbeat of love with Kaguya-sama's heart-pounding animation and charming visuals, complete with quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Kaguya-sama: Love is War with this charming and clever live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A playful interface inspired by the witty and competitive nature of Kaguya and Miyuki, featuring elegant tones with touches of red, white, and gold.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements the fun and romantic vibe of Kaguya-sama.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Engage in Kaguya-sama-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as charming and strategic as the characters’ rivalry.
